pros:
- great leadership, passion for service and quality healthcare
- caring providers willing to work with patients and support staff
- skill building environment, managers are supportive and help you develop your skills, 
- family oriented
- quickly growing, since the clinic is growing rapidly there is opportunity to grow within the organization.
cons: - you are dealing with a variety patients from diverse backgrounds. At times patients can be verbally abusive and mean spirited, but there are moments of graciousness when patients are appreciative and loving. You will need to learn to not take things personally and understand that patients have no other resource besides you.

job_title: Family Nurse Practitioner in Topeka, KS
pros: Serves a community in desperate need of healthcare.
cons: Antiquated EHR, desperately understaffed in patient-facing positions, ridiculously overstaffed behind closed doors.

pros: Plenty of days off and paid vacation
cons: Overall work culture is toxic, with racist and sexist undertones among coworkers.

job_title: Family Nurse Practitioner in Topeka, KS
pros: It was close to home
cons: Lack of support from upper management. No administrative time Low PTO Salary was much lower than local average High patient ratio Spent a lot of time charting from home

pros: Always Hiring! Quick hiring! Fake welcome in interview!
cons: Discrimination in treating their employees. Gossip, rumors and false accusations are the source of information and the trigger of poor retaliating decisions of the high management! Very poor patient care due to laziness and poor supervisory role of high management.

pros: Experience in ALL areas of healthcare
cons: Gotta be on your toes, and be able to take a lot of criticism both good and bad....😶

pros: I Can’t think of any
cons: Over worked and under paid

pros: The benefits are great at GraceMed and it's definitely a family oriented company.
cons: The clinic was grossly understaffed when I started working there, making the training I got abysmal. I also was put in a completely different department than what I was interviewed/hired for.

review_title: Weigh your other options carefully before accepting this one.
pros: The medical clinic staff is wonderful to work with.  They truly care about the patients that they see.  The mission of GraceMed is a great one.
cons: The CEO may have a problem with integrity and telling the truth.  It seems that GraceMed has turned into a money-making machine instead of helping the indigent population as stated in the mission statement

pros: Pay is competitive with similar businesses in the area. Very friendly atmosphere and dedicated culture of service to the community.
cons: Few opportunities to move up.

job_title: Medical Billing Specialist in Wichita, KS
pros: Always plenty off work to do, family environment.
cons: the pay is not that great.

pros: The hours are the only positive.
cons: The senior administration does not value any employee.
